mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachfile_notice(attachno, noticeno, fname, fupname, thumb, fsize, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(attachno), 0) + 1 as attachno FROM attachfile_notice), #{noticeno}, #{fname}, #{fupname}, #{thumb}, #{fsize}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT attachno, noticeno, fname, fupname, thumb, fsize, rdate FROM attachfile_notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC, attachno ASC
SELECT attachno, noticeno, fname, fupname, thumb, fsize, rdate FROM attachfile_notice WHERE noticeno = #{noticeno} ORDER BY fname ASC
